content: 1 1 hold the end of the yarn 2 between your thumb and middle finger and loop the working yarn over your forefinger 2 bring the working yarn back under your middle finger and over your forefinger again 3 turn your hand over and 3 cross the working yarn 4 over the yarn already wrapped around your fingers hold the working yarn with your little finger 4 put your hook under the first strand and grab the second strand easy ribbed hat by dinique diane wilks © 2019 5 6 5 pull the second strand under the first strand do not let go of anything in your hand 6 twist and pull the strand up slightly 7 8 7 now grab the yarn that is being held with your little finger you will have two hoops on your hook 8 chain 1 to secure 9 10 9 when you remove the magic_ring from your fingers it should look like this 10 continue to chain until you have the desired length required if you prefer to watch a video on how to make a magic_ring the following link is a video i found useful the magic_ring instructions finishes at 2 minutes 44 seconds there is no need to watch further https //youtu be/ubeuzhlgzxw easy ribbed hat by dinique diane wilks © 2019 size 1-3 years make a magic_ring chain until you have 9 inches add an additional 2 chains r1 working in the back loops of the chain half_double_crochet in the 3rd chain from the hook half_double_crochet in each chain to until there are 7 chains left single_crochet in the next 3 chains slip_stitch in the next 3 chains slip_stitch the last chain and the magic_ring together ch1 turn r2 slip_stitch in the first stitch slip_stitch in blo in the next 3 stitches single_crochet in blo in the next 3 stitches half_double_crochet in blo until the last stitch half_double_crochet in the last stitch turn r3 ch2 does not count as stitch half_double_crochet in the 1st stitch half_double_crochet in blo in each stitch until the last 7 stitches single_crochet in blo in the next 3 stitches slip_stitch in blo in the next 3 stitches slip_stitch the last stitch and the magic_ring together ch1 turn repeat row 2 and 3 until the edge of the bottom of the hat measures 15 5 inches ending on row 2 do not cut yarn now refer to assembling the hat size 3-10 years make a magic_ring chain until you have 9 5 inches add an additional 2 chains r1 working in the back loops of the chain half_double_crochet in the 3rd chain from the hook
